title: UWC Scholarship Opportunity
description: Full scholarship for two-year pre-university program at United World Colleges
eligibility: Haitian students aged 16-18 with strong academic record and community involvement

title: MIT Summer Research Program
description: Six-week summer research opportunity at MIT with housing and stipend
eligibility: High school seniors with demonstrated interest in STEM

title: Stanford Global Exchange
description: Semester-long exchange program for Haitian undergraduate students
eligibility: Currently enrolled university students with 3.5+ GPA
